answers.answer: Hi,One sided tingly sensations in the body can be due to stress, anxiety, fatigue and lack of sleep. However these symptoms can also be due to TIA, Vitamin deficiencies, diabetes, thyroid dysfunction and autoimmune diseases like MS and also lyme disease.This requires further evaluation so please get yourself checked by your GP.Thanks

question: Hello, Im a 27 year male with tingily sensation to my left arm and left leg. In addition I get tingily sensation to my left side of my mouth. Can these be due to stress since it varys at times when I feel this way. Thank you for taking time in reading my concern.
title: Tingily Sensation
